name: Heiress

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally SPD in Dungeons by 16%.

skills.name: Bullseye
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Grants an Extra Turn if the target is killed.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%

skills.name: Exhortation
skills.raw_description:
Removes 1 random debuff from all allies. Has a 60% chance of placing a 30% [Increase SPD] on all allies for 2 turns.
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Avenger
skills.raw_description: Counterattacks the attacker when ally is attacked.
